Package fr.univparis.metro

Class MatriceWGraph

java.lang.Object
fr.univparis.metro.MatriceWGraph
public class MatriceWGraph
extends Object
Models a graph thanks to matrices (array of arrays). Here, a graph under the form of matrices contains less informations than a graph represented by a hashmap (like in the WGraph class). It only contains the informations to get the path from a station to an other that has the least correspondances possible.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MatriceWGraph​(WGraph<Station> g, HashMap<String,​MatriceWGraph> m)
    To build the graph of the whole subway network.

    Double[][] getDirect()
    Returns the matrice double that contains the time of every itineray.
    HashMap<String,​Integer> getForkAndCycleStation()
    Store all the name of the stations that are initiating a fork or a cycle.
    Integer[][] getIntermediate()
    Returns the matrice intermediate that contains the number of correspondances of every itinerary.
    HashMap<String,​Integer> getSetOfVertices()  
    Station[][] getVia()
    Returns the matrice via.
    static HashMap<String,​MatriceWGraph> initializeAllLineGraphs​(WGraph<Station> g)
    Allows us to build the sub graphs, represented by matrices, of each line of the subway network and store them in an hashmap.

  • Constructor Details

    • MatriceWGraph

      public MatriceWGraph​(WGraph<Station> g, HashMap<String,​MatriceWGraph> m)
      To build the graph of the whole subway network.
      Parameters:
      g - is the graph (of the whole subway network) under the from of a hashMap from which we build the matrice graph.
      m - contains all the sub graphs representing each lines of the graph g.

    • initializeAllLineGraphs

      public static HashMap<String,​MatriceWGraph> initializeAllLineGraphs​(WGraph<Station> g)
      Allows us to build the sub graphs, represented by matrices, of each line of the subway network and store them in an hashmap.
      Parameters:
      g - is a graph under the from of an hashmap from which we build the sub graphs of each line
      Returns:
      an hashmap containing the sub graphs of each line: the key is the name of the line, the value its corresponding graph.
